author: NP
title: TED Talks
synopsis: Here you will find the best talks and performances from TED conferences.
description:
TED  Talks  began as a simple  attempt to share what 
 happens  at  TED  with the world.  Under the moniker 
 ideas worth spreading, talks were released online. 
 They rapidly  attracted  a  global  audience  in the 
 millions.  Indeed, the  reaction was so enthusiastic 
 that the entire  TED  website has been  reengineered 
 around  TED Talks, with the  goal of giving everyone 
 on-demand access to the world's most inspiring voices. 
 
    Plugin developed by NP
